tools.name: list_tables
tools.description: Lists all tables in the connected database. Returns table names, schemas, and types.

tools.name: describe_table
tools.description: Describes the schema of a specific table. Returns column names, data types, nullability, defaults, and keys.

table_name.description: The name of the table to describe

tools.name: execute_readonly_query
tools.description: Executes a read-only SQL query (SELECT only). Write operations are strictly blocked. Returns column names and rows.

query.description: The SQL SELECT query to execute

tools.name: explain_query
tools.description: Returns the execution plan for a SQL query without executing it. Useful for understanding query performance.
